testcase.name: Click GetStarted button that redirect to /docs/intro page in the same tab
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the user click the GetStarted button that opens in the same tab........passed Then the tab should have the GetStarted URL 'https://playwright.dev/docs/intro'..passed

testcase.name: Click GitHubStars button that redirect to github in new tab
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the user click the GitHubStars button that opens in a new tab..........passed Then the new tab should have the GitHubStars URL 'https://github.com/microsoft/playwright'..passed

testcase.name: Click GitHubStarsGazers button that redirect to github in new tab
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the user click the GitHubStarsGazers button that opens in a new tab....passed Then the new tab should have the GitHubStarsGazers URL 'https://github.com/microsoft/playwright/stargazers'..passed

testcase.name: Click GitHub button in header that redirect to github in new tab
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the user click the GitHub button in header that opens in a new tab.....passed Then the new tab should have the GitHub URL 'https://github.com/microsoft/playwright'..passed

testcase.name: Click Discord button in header that redirect to github in new tab
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the user click the Discord button in header that opens in a new tab....passed Then the new tab should have the Discord URL 'https://discord.com/servers/playwright-807756831384403968'..passed

testcase.name: Check that by default site open with system mode
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the site is opened.....................................................passed Then the system mode is chosen..............................................passed

testcase.name: Check that switch mode button change mode to light first time
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the user click switch mode button first time...........................passed Then the mode should change to 'light' first time...........................passed

testcase.name: Check that switch mode button change mode to dark second time
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the user click switch mode button second time..........................passed Then the mode should change to 'dark' second time...........................passed

testcase.name: Check that switch mode button change mode to system third time
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the user click switch mode button third time...........................passed Then the mode should change to 'system' third time..........................passed

testcase.name: Check that user could search for data from header
testcase.system-out: Given the user is navigated to the main page................................passed When the user click search button...........................................passed And the user type 'assertion'...............................................passed Then the input field is filled with 'assertion'.............................passed And the data is found.......................................................passed
